author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Firstrand Ltd Says South African Registrar Of Banks Approved Acquisition of Aldermore by FirstRand Offeror
text:
Feb 28 (Reuters) - Firstrand Ltd:
* REGULATORY APPROVAL * ‍SARB APPROVED ACQUISITION OF ALDERMORE BY FIRSTRAND OFFEROR, A WHOLLY-OWNED SUBSIDIARY OF FIRSTRAND LIMITED​
* ‍ALL REQUIRED REGULATORY APPROVALS HAVE NOW BEEN RECEIVED FOR ACQUISITION OF ALDERMORE BY FIRSTRAND OFFEROR​ Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage: (Reuters.Briefs@thomsonreuters.com)
